overview: On Piggy Bank Road, dead bodies are appearing in areas where the scent of Piggy-related things, such as sosigs and beercaans and porky scratchlings, are pungent to the naked nostril hole. Declan Donnelly is dutti rah shuk as the murders seem to be coming closer to the house he shares with his flat mate, Derrick Stone. When Declan begins to take matters into his own hands, he discovers things you know lik dat. But what will he uncover ? What will he discover? Will he be shuk? Watch to find out Dyldoes xoxo
tagline: One Small Town... Will Be Shooketh... To the Core...Eth
title: Pig Head
